Map showing the west shore of the North or Hudson River

Object Name
Map
Title
Map showing the west shore of the North or Hudson River
Date
[1767?]
Author
Ratzer, Bernard
Contributor or associated name
Baevt, R. C.
Publisher
Royal American Regiment
Place of publication
[Jersey City, NJ]
Holding institution
Library of Congress, Geography and Map Division
Description from holding institution
1 manuscript map, on sheet 50 x 40 cm. from surveys by Lieut. B. Ratzer-of His Majesty's 60th or Royal American Regiment, made in the years 1766 and 1767. Title from penciled annotation in upper left corner. Manuscript, pen-and-ink tracing. Relief shown by hachures. Depths shown by form lines. Shows the coastal area of Jersey City from "Hobocken" to "Salt Meadows." Includes penciled presentation note. Hon. Chas. H. Winfield with respects of R. C. Baevt, c.e. LC Maps of North America, 1750-1789, 1246.
Source
lccn.loc.gov
